eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
\Delta M({\cal K}_{aa})&=&\frac{\hbar m}{2} \left[
\sum_{i=0}^{l-1} \omega_i+s_{l}\omega_{l}-\frac{v_a}{2}  +
\frac{1}{\pi} \int_0^\infty \!\!\! dq \frac{\partial
\delta_a(q)}{\partial q} \sqrt{q^2+v_a^2}- \frac{\left< V_{aa}(x)
\right> }{2 \pi} \right]+ \nonumber \\&+& \hbar m\frac{\left<
V_{aa}(x) \right> }{8 \pi} \int_0^\infty \!\!
\frac{dk}{\sqrt{k^2+v_a^2}}\qquad ,\label{eq:dhn}
\
